类 DWReplayPlayer

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PlayerEventListener

    public class DWReplayPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerEventListener
    在线回放播放器

    rest--->prepare-->preparing->prepared->start

    pause->start
